name: Power Defense (RobBCreates)
description:
Premise

You play as Vega V and you need to fight off the enemy hordes whilst maintaining power to the console.  

Build defenses around the level. but remember that the more defenses you have the faster your power will drain. Enemies will kill the player in a single hit and they drain energy from the defenses on impact. 

Controls

Move - WASD / Arrows / Gamepad analogue

Fire - X key / Gamepad RT

Interact - E key / Gamepad X 

Jump - Space bar / Gamepad A

Start First Wave - R key / Gamepad B (One time input to remove tutorial text and begin play)

Disclaimer!

It's definitely worth reading the intro text spread around the level before starting, there really isn't that much :).

The game currently has partial gamepad support, all gameplay elements work with a gamepad but anything menu related had not been setup. So when purchasing your defenses, you'll need to swap to the mouse.
